extractor.name: Drill

chest.name: Container
chest.description: Stores items. Can determine input/output limits.

hub.name: Hub
hub.description: The heart of your factory. Generates power and serves as the main base.

electric_pole.name: Electric Pole
electric_pole.description: Connects power lines over a distance.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Stores excess energy and releases it when needed. Requires connecting to a power grid.

tech.logistics_tech_desc: Unlocks advanced transportation and storage methods.

shop.title: Intergalactic Shop
shop.description: Purchase additional building licenses with gathered resources.
shop.empty: No buildings available in the shop yet.
shop.empty_desc: Unlock more buildings in the Skill Tree to see them here.

welcome_intro.title: Welcome Pioneer
welcome_intro.text: Welcome to the surface! I am ADA, your automated assistant. The planetary resources are ripe for extraction.

welcome_task.title: Mission Objective
welcome_task.text: Your goal is to build a self-sustaining factory. Open the Build Menu (Press B) and place the Hub to establish your base.

first_selection.title: Object Selection
first_selection.text: You have selected an object! The Info Panel on the right shows details about it. You can see production rates, inventory, and status.

electricity.title: Power System
electricity.text: Machines need power to run. Build Wind Turbines (at the Hub) and connect them to machines using Electric Poles and Cables. Monitor your grid status!

hub_placed.title: Hub Established
hub_placed.text: Excellent work! The Hub is the heart of your factory. It generates initial power and allows you to craft basic components. Click on it to access its interface.

hub_info_overview.title: Hub Overview
hub_info_overview.text_1: Welcome to the main Hub dashboard. On the left, you can see your current power production and the overall status of your base.
hub_info_overview.text_2: On the right is the Evolution Tree. This is where you will unlock new technologies and upgrades.
hub_info_overview.text_3: To unlock the next evolutions, you will need to collect the required resources shown. Start mining!

hub_info_tree.title: Technology Tree
hub_info_tree.text: Here is the Upgrade Tree. Use collected resources to unlock new technologies, buildings, and upgrades for your factory.

extractor_no_power.title: Power Required
extractor_no_power.text: Your Drill has stopped! It needs electricity to function. Connect it to a power source (Wind Turbine or Hub) using a Cable.

extractor_no_resources.title: Resource Depleted
extractor_no_resources.text: This Drill has run out of resources to mine. You should deconstruct it (Delete Tool) and move it to a fresh resource node.

mined_stone.title: Stone Extracted
mined_stone.text: You are extracting Stone. This is a basic building material used for foundations and basic components.

mined_iron.title: Iron Ore
mined_iron.text: You found Iron! Smelt this into Iron Ingots to craft stronger structures and machinery.

building_menu_intro.title: Construction Menu
building_menu_intro.text_1: On the right is the list of available buildings. You can drag and drop them to your hotbar below for quick access.
building_menu_intro.text_2: On the left, information appears when you hover over a building. Read carefully, it explains how each structure works.
building_menu_intro.text_3: Try adding the Hub by clicking on it to start.

hub_shop_intro.title: Factory Supplies
hub_shop_intro.text_1: Welcome to the Hub Shop. Here you can purchase additional building licenses using your surplus resources.
hub_shop_intro.text_2: Note that each purchase increases the price of future licenses for that building. Manage your budget carefully!

error_locked.title: Blueprint Locked
error_locked.text: This building has not been researched yet! Check the Skill Tree in the Hub to unlock it.

error_cost.title: Insufficient Resources
error_cost.text: You do not have enough resources to construct this building.

error_limit.title: Placement Limit Reached
error_limit.text: You have reached the maximum number of this building type you can place. Buy more licenses in the Shop!

building_menu.intro_text: On the right is your catalog of available buildings. Drag them to your hotbar or click to build.
building_menu.intro_hub: Start by placing the Hub. You have 1 unit available to establish your main base.
